1. Preamble

Whereas the EMPLOYEE was engaged by the COMPANY, the PARTIES, and has become desirous of separation of their relationship on the following terms and conditions:

  1. After consultation between the EMPLOYEE and the COMPANY it is recorded that the EMPLOYEE tendered to separate his employment with the COMPANY on a voluntary basis. The EMPLOYEE acknowledges and agrees that he accepts the notice in terms of this agreement and that the matter is settled in full and final. He agrees that this is not a dismissal and therefore agrees not to pursue any claim in any form regarding the fairness of the termination of his services and/or his non re-employment or re-instatement after termination of service. It is hereafter agreed between the PARTIES on the following points:
  2. The effective date of the agreement is the {{doc.effective_date}} and the notice period will be until the {{doc.notice_ends}}, the EMPLOYEE will be released of all duties as from the {{doc.release_date}}. All outstanding monies will be paid in full to the EMPLOYEE.


2. Settlement

  1. The EMPLOYEE acknowledges that he/she hereby agrees and accepts that the termination of his employment is fair. The EMPLOYER acknowledges that the employee has {{doc.completed_years}} year(s) of service.
  2. The COMPANY shall pay the EMPLOYEE the following settlement less statutory deductions, which settlement is explicitly agreed to be inclusive of any and all statutory, contractual or other entitlements which the EMPLOYER is, or may be deemed to be obligated to, the EMPLOYEE. It is therefore recorded that the benefit paid to the EMPLOYEE exceeds statutory payments and therefore is more beneficial than those contemplated in law.
  3. The settlement amount will be subject to taxation and statutory deduction. The settlement amount will be paid to the EMPLOYEE via bank transfer into his bank account.
  4. The PARTIES agrees that the payment will be made on or before the {{doc.payment_date}}, subject to the receipt of a SARS Tax Directive. It should be noted that it is a requirement that the EMPLOYEE go for medical exit, before any payments can be made.
  5. The PARTIES hereby agree that the EMPLOYEE’s UI19 will reflect the reason of termination as “Voluntary Severance Package”.
  6. Payment in the amount due in terms of this agreement is made in full and final settlement of all claims of whatsoever nature the EMPLOYEE has or may have against the EMPLOYER arising out of his employment with the EMPLOYER or the termination thereof, whether such claims arise contractually, dialectally or out of statutory provision, including but not limited to the EMPLOYEE not instituting proceedings against the EMPLOYER under the Basic Conditions of Employment Act, the Labour Relations Act and the Employment Equity Act.

 

The PARTIES agrees that the EMPLOYER shall pay the EMPLOYEE as per the breakdown below:

By accepting the settlement amount in this settlement agreement, the EMPLOYEE acknowledges and agrees that his employment with the COMPANY is terminated by voluntary and mutual agreement, and that no future re-employment with the EMPLOYER is possible.
    

3. Agreement Confidentiality

  1. The EMPLOYEE shall keep confidential and not disclose the settlement to any person, save insofar as it may be necessary to do so to give effect to any requirement of law.


4. Sole Agreement

  1. This agreement constitutes the sole agreement between the PARTIES regarding the termination of the relationship between the EMPLOYEE and the EMPLOYER and no variation, modification or waiver of any provisions of this agreement or consent to any departure there from shall in any event be of any force or effect unless confirmed in writing and signed by the PARTIES, and then such variation, modification, waiver or consent shall be effective only in specific instance and for the purpose and to the extent to which it was made or given.
  2. The waiver by any PARTY of any breach of the Terms or Conditions of this agreement shall not prejudice any remedy of the waiver PARTY in respect of any continuing or other breach of the Term and Conditions hereof.
  3. No favor, delay, relaxation or indulgence on the part of any PARTY in exercising any power or right preclude any other or further exercise thereof or the exercise of any power or right under this agreement.

 

This is done and signed at                                                    this               day of                             20           .
